executiveSummary: Hillary, founder and CEO of The Style Club, pitched her fashion startup seeking $500,000 for 20% equity. Despite concerns about exclusivity with Urban Outfitters and lack of diversification, Mark Cuban offered $500,000 for 33.3%, which Hillary accepted.
keyDecisions: Mark Cuban invested $500,000 for 33.3% equity in The Style Club.

actionItems.task: Build out the Style Clubâ€™s direct-to-consumer and online shopping app to reduce reliance on retail exclusivity.
Continue fulfilling Urban Outfitters purchase orders while planning for expansion beyond exclusivity.

nextSteps: Hillary will work with Mark Cuban to grow The Style Club, focusing on expanding direct-to-consumer sales and developing the video shopping app.
